Description:
Detects the use of the 'Launch-VsDevShell.ps1' Microsoft signed script to execute commands.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Launch-VsDevShell.PS1 Proxy Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%vswherepath %' or command like '%vsinstallationpath %') and command like '%launch-vsdevshell.ps1%')
